Corporate Governance[Sandip Patil](https://jbssinc.com/author/sandip-patilxcelacore-com/ "Posts by Sandip Patil")2024-11-05T10:06:32-06:00

# CORPORATE GOVERNANCE

To continue to be a trusted partner for all shareholders, JBSS prides itself on incorporating best practices in corporate governance to ensure we are achieving our commitment to integrity through our organization. Our corporate governance structure applies to all JBSS employees to create accountability and transparency at every level of the organization. These governance processes and practices include regular review and robust discussion with our Board of Directors through our Nominating and Governance Committee.

## Our Corporate Governance Policies

[Anonymous Incident Reporting](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/EthicsPoint-Whistleblower-Hotline_06.13.2018-2.pdf)

[Anti-Hedging Policy](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/JBSS-Anti-Hedging-Policy-10-30-19.pdf)

[Anti-Pledging Policy](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/JBSS_Anti-Pledging_Policy-Final-1-27-22.docx)

[Audit Committee Charter](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/JBSS-Audit-Committee-Charter-October-30-2024.pdf)

[Board of Directors Code of Conduct](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/JBSS-Directors-Code-of-Ethics-and-Business-Dealing-October-30-2024.pdf)

[Board Diversity Matrix](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Board-Diversity-Matrix-9-12-24.pdf)

[Code of Conduct](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/JBSS-Code-of-Conduct-October-30-2024.pdf)

[Code of Ethics](/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Code-of-Ethics-10-29-2014.pdf)

[Compensation and Human Resources Committee Charter](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/JBSS-Compensation-HR-Committee-Charter-October-30-2024.pdf)

[Corporate Governance Guidelines](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/JBSS-Corporate-Governance-Guidelines-October-30-2024.pdf)

[Equity Award Policy](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Sanfilippo-Equity-Award-Policy-11-2-23.pdf)

[Human Rights Policy](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Human_Rights_Policy_8.30.24.pdf)

[Nasdaq Clawback Policy](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/JBSS-Nasdaq-Clawback-Policy-Final-11-02-23.pdf)

[Nominating and Governance Committee Charter](https://jbssinc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/JBSS-Nominating-and-Governance-Committee-Charter-October-30-2024.pdf)

Investor Contact[Sandip Patil](https://jbssinc.com/author/sandip-patilxcelacore-com/ "Posts by Sandip Patil")2024-07-23T10:36:07-05:00

# INVESTOR CONTACT

For investor related inquiries, please contact InvestorInformation@jbssinc.com.

**Investor Relations**

John B. Sanfilippo & Son, Inc. 1703 N. Randall Road Elgin, IL 60123 Ph: 847-214-4612

OR

John Beisler or Steven Hooser Three Part Advisors, LLC Ph: 817-310-8776

**E-Proxy and Annual Report Information**

A Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the “Internet Notice”) will be mailed to stockholders of record who were not mailed the printed proxy materials. The Internet Notice provides details regarding the availability of our full proxy materials, including our proxy statement and our annual report, at the Internet website address <http://www.proxydocs.com/JBSS>. All stockholders of record were mailed either the Internet Notice, or the printed proxy materials which include a proxy card. If a stockholder wishes to vote electronically, the stockholder should follow the instructions on how to vote electronically that are included on the stockholder’s proxy card or Internet Notice.

**Stockholder Address/Title Changes**

Stockholders must submit changes to the address and/or title associated with their stock certificates by contacting our transfer agent:

American Stock Transfer & Trust Company, LLC 6201 15th Avenue Brooklyn, NY 11219 1-(800)-937-5449 [www.astfinancial.com](https://www.astfinancial.com)

We shall not be responsible for the consequences of a stockholder’s failure to provide such updates to our transfer agent, which could include, but are not limited to, loss of shares, non-payment of dividends or non-receipt of proxy solicitation materials.

For investor related inquiries, please contact InvestorInformation@jbssinc.com.

**Investor Relations**

John B. Sanfilippo & Son, Inc. 1703 N. Randall Road Elgin, IL 60123 Ph: 847-214-4612

OR

John Beisler or Steven Hooser Three Part Advisors, LLC Ph: 817-310-8776

**E-Proxy and Annual Report Information**

On or about September 22, 2016, a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the “Internet Notice”) was mailed to stockholders who were not sent the printed proxy materials. The Internet Notice provides details regarding the availability of our full proxy materials, including our proxy statement and our annual report, at the Internet website address http://www.proxydocs.com/JBSS. All stockholders were mailed either the Internet Notice, or the printed proxy materials which include a proxy card. If a stockholder wishes to vote electronically, the stockholder should follow the instructions on how to vote electronically that are included on the stockholder’s proxy card or Internet Notice.

**Stockholder Address/Title Changes**

Stockholders must submit changes to the address and/or title associated with their stock certificates by contacting our transfer agent:

American Stock Transfer & Trust Company, LLC 6201 15th Avenue Brooklyn, NY 11219 1-(800)-937-5449 [www.astfinancial.com](https://www.astfinancial.com)

We shall not be responsible for the consequences of a stockholder’s failure to provide such updates to our transfer agent, which could include, but are not limited to, loss of shares, non-payment of dividends or non-receipt of proxy solicitation materials.
